PATIENT_ID: TEST_PE_001
ARRIVAL_TIME: 2026-02-01 09:00:00

[PHYSICIAN_NOTE] 2026-02-01 09:30:00
Patient admitted for hip fracture repair. Post-op day 2, developed acute shortness of breath and tachycardia.

[IMAGING] 2026-02-03 14:00:00
CT PULMONARY ANGIOGRAM (CTPA)

FINDINGS:
Filling defects consistent with acute pulmonary emboli in the right lower lobe segmental arteries.
Right heart strain noted.

IMPRESSION:
Acute pulmonary embolism, right lower lobe.

[PHYSICIAN_NOTE] 2026-02-03 15:00:00
Acute PE diagnosed. Developed postoperatively during hospitalization.
Started on therapeutic anticoagulation immediately.

[LAB] 2026-02-03 14:30:00
D-dimer: 4200 ng/mL (markedly elevated)
Troponin: 0.08 ng/mL (mildly elevated, consistent with RV strain)
